247244.「へへ～ どうどう？\n イカスでしょ！: Heheh～ What do you think? Isn't it cute?

247245.「ペーペーのアタシだけど 見た目だけなら\n 熟練のデスマスターに 見えるっしょ:
I may be a novice, but I look like a seasoned
death master, don't I? First of all, I have to
look the part.

247246.「ヤバッ……今さら キンチョーしてきたし！\n 戦う以上 無傷じゃ すまされない:
Uh oh... now I'm getting all nervous! We won't
get through this fight unscathed, will we?
Worst case, we might even die...

247247.「でも アタシら デスマスターは\n 死なないんだっけ？\n ん？ あれ こんな:
But we death masters don't die, do we? Huh?
Where have I heard that before...?

247249.「ウッソだー！！ 死なない人間なんて\n いるわけないじゃん。:
Liar! There's no such thing as a person who
doesn't die.

247250.「うふふ……わたくしたちには\n 死を乗りこえる チカラがあるのよ。: Mhmhm... We have the power to surpass death.

247251.「じゃあ アタシも デスマスターになる！: Then I'll be a death master, too!

247252.「ダメよぅ。だって あなたの霊感を\n 封じなければ ならないから……。:
You can't. Because I have to seal away your
spiritual senses...

247253.「おっかしいの……。こんなときだってのに\n 昔の記憶が よみがえってきたよ。:
Strange... even now, old memories are starting
to come back to me.

247254.「デズ師匠いわく デスマスターは\n 死を乗りこえるチカラが あるんだってさ。:
Master Dezzie says that death masters have the
power to surpass death.

247255.「だから 行こう <cs_pchero>！\n ギス野郎に 天誅を食らわせよーぜ:
So let's go, <cs_pchero>! We're gonna
bring some divine punishment down on that
creep, to avenge the one who took care of me.

247273.「おかえりなさい <pc>さん。\n あら？ ネリムちゃんの姿が見えないけど\n:
Welcome back, <pc>. Oh? I don't
see Nelim with you.

247274.「よかった 無事なのね……ほっとしたわ～。: Thank goodness she's okay... I'm so relieved!

247275.「戦い慣れてない ネリムちゃんを守りながら\n ギスマイヤーと戦うのは\n さぞ:
It must have been very difficult to fight
Gismeyer while protecting Nelim, who is not
used to fighting.

247276.「ありがとうね <pc>さん。\n こちら わたくしからの 感謝の気持ちよ。\n:
Thank you, <pc>. Here is a token
of my appreciation. Please accept it.

247277.「たっだいまー！ いえ～い！\n デズ師匠のカタキ とってきたよー！: I'm back! Yay! I avenged Master Dezzie!

247278.「お疲れさま ネリムちゃん。\n 活躍っぷりは <pc>さんから\n うかがって:
Good job, Nelim. I heard about your success
from <pc>. I give you a hundred
points!

247279.「思ったより 楽勝だったよ。\n 死霊の書も……はい！ このとーり！:
It was easier than I thought. As for the Book
of the Dead... ta-dah! Just like that!

247280.「この死霊の書が 二度と 人手に渡らぬよう\n 厳重に 管理していかないとね。\:
We have to make sure the Book of the Dead
never falls into the wrong hands again. Now,
what should we do...?

247282.「どうせ 悪用されるだけだし\n こんなモン この世にないほうが いいよ。:
It's better that something like this doesn't
exist in this world, since it's going to be
abused anyway.

247284.「あなたって子は 本当に……\n わたくし おどろかされっぱなしよ。: You really do... continue to surprise me.

247285.「仕事を続けていけば これからだって\n おどろくようなことは いくらでも起こる:
If we keep working together, you'll be even
more surprised later!

247286.「あらためまして <pc> デズ師匠！\n これからも アタシら ３人で\n デ:
Once again, from the top! Let's keep up the
good work as a trio of death masters,
<pc>, Master Dezzie!

247288.「え？ ちょっとちょっと 何よ。\n リアクション うすいんですケド。:
Huh? What is it? That was a really weak
reaction.

247289.「ネリムちゃん……わたくしが 幽霊として\n 存在している理由を 考えてみて。: Nelim... think about why I exist as a ghost.

247290.「それはね この世に 未練があったからよ。\n 死霊の書を 取り戻せなかった……:
It's because I had regrets in this world. I
couldn't get the Book of the Dead back... I
couldn't protect you.

247291.「だけど もう…………\n あなたを ねらう者が現れる心配は\n ないでしょう。:
But now... I don't have to worry about anyone
coming after you anymore. I have no regrets.

247293.「身体がないまま 現世に とどまるのは\n とてもとても つらいことなのよ。:
It's very difficult to remain in this world
without a body.

247295.「ネリムちゃん <pc>さん。\n 今まで 本当に ありがとう……。\n ふたり:
Nelim, <pc>. Thank you for
everything you've done for me... Please send
my soul off.

247296.「知ってるかしら？ デスマスターは死なないの。\n 死をも 乗りこえるのよ。あの:
Don't you know? Death masters don't die. They
surpass death. I'll be watching over both of
you from the afterlife.

247297.「ウソばっかし！\n 死なない人間なんて いないし\n 幽霊だって 消えたら そ:
You're a liar! There's no such thing as a
person that doesn't die, and even ghosts
disappear and are never seen again.

247298.「あらあら～ お尻の青い ヒヨコちゃんが\n ウソだと 言いきってしまうの？\n:
Oh my～, a greenhorn hatchling like you is
calling me a liar? I wonder where that
confidence comes from?

247299.「真実は 死んだデスマスターにしか\n わからないのよ。もっともっと 修行して\:
Only a dead death master can know the truth.
Train harder and aim higher, little Nelim.

247300.「ほとんど 遺言じゃん……断れないし。:
If that's your last will... I can't really say
no.

247301.「わかった！ アタシらで 師匠を送る。\n やろう <pc>！:
Okay! We'll send Master off. Let's do it,
<pc>!

247302.「ふたりとも もう いいわ。旅立てそうよ。\n 今まで 本当に……ありがとうね。:
The two of you will be just fine. I'll be
going now. Thank you... for everything.

247303.「アタシが生きてるのは 師匠のおかげ。\n 守ってくれて ありがとぉ！:
I'm alive because of you. Thank you for
protecting me!

247305.「あ～あ……アタシも 晴れて\n デスマスターになれたし ３人で\n 仕事を続け:
Ahhh～... I thought that after I finally
became a death master, the three of us could
continue working together.

247306.「でも あきらめたワケじゃないよ！ \n アタシ デズ師匠の遺言どおり\n もっ:
But I'm not giving up! I'm going to follow
Master Dezzie's will and train even harder to
be the best I can be!

247307.「んで 名の知れた デスマスターになって\n いつか 探偵事務所を ひらくんだ。:
Then I'll become a famous death master, and one day I'll open my own detective agency. And then I'll be the boss and you'll be my
assistant.

247309.「ごきげんよう ネリムちゃん。\n お仕事のほうは 順調そうね。:
Good day to you, Nelim. Your work seems to be
going well.

247310.「わたくし あの世で 元気にやってるわよ～。: I'm doing fine in the afterlife.

247311.「ふふっ 言ったでしょ？\n デスマスターは 死なないって。:
Hmhm, didn't I tell you? Death masters don't
die.

247313.「書を奪おうとも ムダだッ！\n 死霊の復活は 止まらんよ！:
It's pointless to take the book now! The
spirits of the dead will never stop coming!

247314.「聞け！ 死霊たちよ！\n この者から 死霊の書を取りあげよ！:
Hear me, my undead servants! Take back the
Book of the Dead from them!

247317.「はなせッ！ 私は お前たちの王だぞ！: Let go! I am your king!

247318.「へへ～ん 書を 奪ったのは\n ムダじゃなかったようだねぇ。:
Heheh, looks like taking the book wasn't
pointless after all.

247319.「さてと……こいつを封印する方法は\n デズ師匠から 教えてもらったんだけど\n:
Well... Master Dezzie taught me how to seal
this thing, but if it doesn't stop the
summoning... what then?

247320.「むき～ 考えても わからんし\n とりあえず 後回し 後回し！\n 今は こい:
Grr, it's too hard to think about, so just put
it off for later! Right now, sealing this is
more important!

247322.「やっべ 召喚 止まってやんの！\n アタシら ツイてるじゃん！: Hey, the summoning stopped! Lucky us!

247324.「そーだ！ <cs_pchero>！\n いっしょに お祈りして 昇天させよう。:
That's right! <cs_pchero>! Let's pray
together and send them off.

247325.「ぐはぁ！ やめろぉー！！ はなせッ！: Aaah! No! Let go of me!

247326.「大好きな死体に 囲まれて\n あの世で 幸せに暮らせよな～★:
May you live happily ever after, surrounded by
your precious corpses～★

247327.「デスマスターとしての 初仕事\n これにて完了っと！ 幸先いいじゃん アタシ！:
My first job as death master is complete! A
pretty good start, if I say so myself!

247328.「そんじゃ <cs_pchero>。\n デズ師匠のうちに 帰ろっか。:
Well then, <cs_pchero>. Let's go back to
Master Dezzie's house.

247740.<cs_pchero>と ネリムは ヘドロの沼地を後にし\nグレン領東へ 帰った:
<cs_pchero> and Nelim left Sludge Swamp
and returned to Glen East...

249949.「ちょっと ちょっと 見て見て！\n チャンスじゃん！ こっちに気づいてないよ。:
Hey, hey, look! Here's our chance! He hasn't
noticed us yet. Let's finish this quickly.

249950.「よし！ アタシが 先 しかけっから\n <cs_pchero>は あとから つ:
All right! I'll go in first, and you follow
behind me, <cs_pchero>.

249951.「おや？ 誰かと思えば ネリム君か！？\n それに <cs_pchero>君まで:
Oh? If it isn't Nelim! And <cs_pchero>,
too!

249952.「なんともはや……キミたちは\n 死んだものとばかり 思っていたのに\n がっか:
What a disappointing reunion... I thought you
were both dead.

249953.「お前に チャンスを くれてやんよ。\n おとなしく 死霊の書を渡すなら\n 全:
I'll give you one chance. If you give me the
Book of the Dead quietly, I'll make sure you
make a full recovery in about 2 months.

249956.「これで カケラの罪悪感もなく\n アンタを沼に 沈めてやれるじゃんよォ。:
Now I can drown you in this swamp without an
ounce of guilt.

249957.「フフフ……フハハハハ！\n 弱い犬ほど よく吠えるねぇ！ 空を見たまえ！:
Hmhmhm... hahahahaha! Weak dogs sure love to
bark! Take a look at the sky!

249958.「昼でありながら もっとも 闇が濃い。\n あの世と この世の境界が あいまいに:
Darkness even during the daytime. The boundary between this world and the afterlife have become blurred, making this the perfect time
to summon the souls of the dead.

249959.「ここはね ガテリア皇国と ウルベア帝国という\n 古代の大国同士が 覇権をかけ:
This is a cursed land where the ancient powers
of Gateria and Urbea fought for supremacy.

249960.「ゆえに！ 私たちの足元には 大量の死者が\n 眠っているッ！ 今 死霊の書を使:
Therefore! A great number of the dead lie at
our feet! If I use the Book of the Dead now,
many of them will come back to life!

249961.「そして 私だけの 死霊の王国が誕生する！:
And my very own kingdom of the dead will be
born!

249962.「あー はいはい。アタシ むずかしーことは\n わかんないんだわー。でも アンタ:
Yeah, yeah, I don't really care about all that
complicated stuff. But I can tell that you
REALLY want me to drown you in this swamp.

249964.「フフフフ……こちらには 数のチカラがある。\n 召喚の儀は とっくに 終わって:
Hmhmhmhm... I have the advantage in numbers.
The summoning ritual is already completed.

249965.「さあ キミたちも 我が国の民として\n 迎えいれて やろうじゃないか！！: Come, let us welcome you as one of our own!!
